pageContext.claim: “USMCA is the biggest deal ever made.”
pageContext.analysis: The new trade agreement between the U.S., Canada and Mexico makes key revisions to some parts of NAFTA; it's not a wholesale rewrite. Trump is wrong to claim it's "the largest trade deal ever made in the world." The ASEAN deal is bigger, the Uruguay Round was bigger, and the Trans-Pacific Partnership negotiated by the Obama administration was bigger before Trump withdrew.
